alert.note: Alert for Dent; Lawrence; Newton; Phelps (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 02 at 1:10PM CST until March 03 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, south central, and southwest Missouri, including the following counties, in central Missouri, Pulaski. In east central Missouri, Phelps. In south central Missouri, Dent. In southwest Missouri, Greene, Laclede, Lawrence and Newton. * WHEN...From 6 PM CST this evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low- water crossings may be flooded. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
